lead_paragraph: Frank Thomas went 2 for 4 with a two-run homer after switching batting helmets before the game Saturday, and the Toronto Blue Jays used a six-run eighth inning to beat the visiting Boston Red Sox, 10-2.
snippet: Frank Thomas went 2 for 4 with a two-run homer after switching batting helmets before the game Saturday, and the Toronto Blue Jays used a six-run eighth inning to beat the visiting Boston Red Sox, 10-2.
